name: costliness
content:
costliness noun [U]
(HIGH PRICE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of being expensive or too expensive: The hotel is very popular, despite its costliness. People still use this credit without realizing its costliness.
More examplesFewer examplesDespite the costliness of this best rated vacuum cleaner, it still catches the attention of consumers. The costliness of deportation is enormous and the results it obtains doubtful.London, Rome or Paris were extremely expensive - with all the allure and social cachet that costliness implies.
